name: Jinbaori, Black
description: The Jinbaori is an overcoat was worn by the Samurai over their armor. It comes down to the thighs and is trimmed in gold down the front, on the edge of the sleeves and along the bottom hem. The slits on the back and front of the shoulders may be used to carry your Katana, dagger or to tie down armor.  This Japanese piece of clothing will enhance the...

name: Samurai Pants, Black
description: These Black Samurai pants are an adapted version that is more larp ready but adheres to the tradition style.  Any Japanese warrior would love to own this pair of hakama, its loose fitting legs than hinder no movement. 13 different loops contour this Japanese costume providing an efficient way to sheath your weapons....
